channel.title: Ctf on Yolan Romailler
channel.description: Recent content in Ctf on Yolan Romailler

item.title: CTF Writeup / PlaidCTF / Echo
item.description: We’re given a webapp performing text2speech on a maximium of 4 tweets. Exploiting an remote command injection in the dockerized script generating the audio allows to decode remotely the flag before exfiltrating it using text2speech.
